name: Sweet Trefoil
description:
Note: Game was updated after the deadline. The previous versions are in the download section.

Sweet Trefoil

The boundary between worlds has been growing thin. It was just a matter of time until the entities of the other side invade. They have to be stopped before they can deal any damage.

Controls:

  • ➡ Run right
  • ⬅ Run left
  • ⬆   Jump
  • ⬇   Duck
  • Y   Attack
  • C   Buy

Controller compatible

Music by: Coma-Media on Pixabay.com

SFX: Pixabay.com
